title: Los Olivos
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Buffet, Salad bar, Take-out, Mexican
description: Full service vegetarian restaurant at a spa hotel, 20 minute walk or short taxi ride from the center. Many dishes contain egg and dairy, but there are several vegan choices. Mid-sized dining room with uniformed waitstaff. Serves a daily menu with mini buffet as well as an extensive menu with veggie steaks, burgers, and tacos.
